content.rendered:
The MCG called, they want their lights back. STEDI’s all new 8inch 60W Hyper Flood LED make for the ideal flood light for camping, agricultural or mining machines. The super wide 120 degree beam angle provides incredible coverage unmatched by anything else that is currently on the market. The beam is not only wide it’s also unbelievably smooth, which provides outstanding clarity.

120 DEGREE FLOOD HYPER FLOOD BEAM

60W

DETAILS

  • Hardened Steel U Bracket
  • 5 Watt CREE LED
  • Optical Hardened PC Lens
  • Environmentally Sealed Deutsch DT2 Connectors
  • 24 Month Warranty

Price quoted is for 1 unit.

SPECIFICATIONS

POWER 60 Watts
LED CHIP 5W Watt High Intensity CREE
CURRENT DRAW 3.8A @ 12v, 1.9A @ 24v
VOLTAGE 9 to 32v
RAW LUMENS 5,400LM
INGRESS PROTECTION IP67
COLOUR TEMP 6000k
LIFESPAN 50,000hrs
LENS Harden Optical PC
WEIGHT 1.8kg
OPERATING TEMP  – 40 to 155 C
HOUSING MATERIAL Aluminium Alloy with Polyester UV Powder Coat
DIMENSIONS (EXCLUDING BRACKETS) (W)185mmx(D)80mm(H)74mm

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • 1 x 8″ 60W Hyper Flood LED Light
  • Male and Female Deutsch with Pigtail
  • 3 Series Stainless Nuts & Bolts

excerpt.rendered: Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
